something is not an exact science.transl: if you say that an activity is not an exact science, you mean that it involves opinions, guessing etc
Predicting the weather is not an exact science.
used to say that something involves a lot of guessing and there is not just one right way to do it
Advertising is not an exact science – you’re always taking a risk.
